    • Method Detail

      • getDimension

        @Nullable
public static net.proteusframework.core.metric.Dimension getDimension(net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.FileEntity imageFile)
                                                               throws CmsValidationException,
                                                                      NullPointerException,
                                                                      IOException
        Get the dimension of the specified image file.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - the image file.
        Returns:
        the dimension or null if the resolution of the image could not be determined.
        Throws:
        CmsValidationException - if the file is not an image.
        NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getResource

        @Nullable
public static net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.FactoryBasedResource getResource(net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.FileEntity imageFile,
                                                                                    net.proteusframework.core.metric.Dimension dim,
                                                                                    int maxWidth,
                                                                                    int maxHeight)
                                                                                    throws CmsValidationException,
                                                                                           NullPointerException,
                                                                                           IOException
        Get the image resource. Either maxWidth or maxHeight may be 0 -- not both.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - the image file.
        dim - the image file dimension.
        maxWidth - the max width of the resource.
        maxHeight - the max height of the resource.
        Returns:
        the sized image or null if an image of the specified size could not be created.
        Throws:
        CmsValidationException - if the file is not an image or the dimensions specified are invalid.
        NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getResource

        public static net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.FactoryBasedResource getResource(net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.FileEntity imageFile,
                                                                           int maxWidth,
                                                                           int maxHeight)
                                                                                    throws CmsValidationException,
                                                                                           NullPointerException,
                                                                                           IOException
        Get the image resource. Either maxWidth or maxHeight may be 0 -- not both.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - the image file.
        maxWidth - the max width of the resource.
        maxHeight - the max height of the resource.
        Returns:
        the sized image or null if an image of the specified size could not be created.
        Throws:
        CmsValidationException - if the file is not an image or the dimensions specified are invalid.
        NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getScaledDimension

        public static net.proteusframework.core.metric.Dimension getScaledDimension(net.proteusframework.core.metric.Dimension original,
                                                            int maxWidth,
                                                            int maxHeight)
        Get the scaled dimensions.
        Parameters:
        original - the original dimensions.
        maxWidth - the max width or 0.
        maxHeight - the max height or 0.
        Returns:
        the scaled dimensions.

      • isFormatSupportedByImageIO

        public static boolean isFormatSupportedByImageIO(net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.FileEntity file)
        Check if a file is in a format that is supported by ImageIO based upon matching the content type or testing the actual file contents as a last resort.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        true if the file is an image in a format that ImageIO can use.
